name: androidpublisher
title: Google Play Developer API
description: Lets Android application developers access their Google Play accounts.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

schemas.name: InappPurchase
schemas.desc: An InappPurchase resource indicates the status of a user's inapp product purchase.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: This kind represents an inappPurchase object in the androidpublisher service.

fields.name: purchaseState
fields.desc:
The purchase state of the order. Possible values are:  
- Purchased 
- Cancelled

fields.name: purchaseTime
fields.desc: The time the product was purchased, in milliseconds since the epoch (Jan 1, 1970).

fields.name: consumptionState
fields.desc:
The consumption state of the inapp product. Possible values are:  
- Yet to be consumed 
- Consumed

fields.name: developerPayload
fields.desc: A developer-specified string that contains supplemental information about an order.

schemas.name: SubscriptionPurchase
schemas.desc: A SubscriptionPurchase resource indicates the status of a user's subscription purchase.

fields.name: autoRenewing
fields.desc: Whether the subscription will automatically be renewed when it reaches its current expiry time.

fields.name: initiationTimestampMsec
fields.desc: Time at which the subscription was granted, in milliseconds since the Epoch.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: This kind represents a subscriptionPurchase object in the androidpublisher service.

fields.name: validUntilTimestampMsec
fields.desc: Time at which the subscription will expire, in milliseconds since the Epoch.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Checks the purchase and consumption status of an inapp item.

pathParams.name: packageName
pathParams.desc: The package name of the application the inapp product was sold in (for example, 'com.some.thing').

pathParams.name: token
pathParams.desc: The token provided to the user's device when the inapp product was purchased.

methods.name: cancel
methods.desc: Cancels a user's subscription purchase. The subscription remains valid until its expiration time.

pathParams.name: packageName
pathParams.desc: The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').

pathParams.name: token
pathParams.desc: The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Checks whether a user's subscription purchase is valid and returns its expiry time.

pathParams.name: packageName
pathParams.desc: The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').

pathParams.name: token
pathParams.desc: The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.
